contentrichtext.text: {{sisterlinks|sama}} '''Sama''' may refer to: ;Places * [[Sama (Harstad)]], a part of Harstad city in northern Norway * [[Sama, Asturias]], a parish in the municipality of Langreo in northern Spain * [[Sama, South Khorasan]], a village in Iran ;People * [[Sama people]], an indigenous ethnic group of the Philippines and Malaysia * [[Bajau]] ethnic group in Borneo also known Sama * Sama, a character of the [[Mahabharata]] * [[Samma tribe]], a Rajput tribe in Pakistan and India ;Religion * [[Shamash]], the Assyrian and Babylonian sun god * [[Sama (Sufism)]], form of Sufi ritual ceremony * Sama, the indigenous religion of the [[Munda people|Munda]] people of India ;Others * [[Sama Dubai]], a property company based in Dubai * [[Japanese honorifics#Sama|Japanese honorifics: ''Sama'']] (様), a Japanese honorific suffix * [[Sama Airlines]] * [[Sama language]], or Sama-Bajau * [[Sama language (Angola)]] * [[Sama (film)]], directed by [[Néjia Ben Mabrouk]] '''SAMA''' may refer to: * [[Saudi Arabian Monetary Agency]] * [[South African Medical Association]] * [[San Antonio Museum of Art]] * [[South African Music Awards]] * [[South Atlantic Magnetic Anomaly]] * [[Scientific Apparatus Makers Association]], a former organisation for automation standards in the U.S. {{disambig}}
